subject: Casinos
Boxing
lead_paragraph: The Floyd Mayweather-Manny Pacquiao fight on May 2 helped Nevada casinos make more than $1 billion off gamblers in May, according to casino records.
snippet: The Floyd Mayweather-Manny Pacquiao fight on May 2 helped Nevada casinos make more than $1 billion off gamblers in May, according to casino records.
